content: क्लांत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [क्लम्-क्त] {@--1@} Fatigued, tired out; तमातपक्लांतं <ls>R. 2. 13</ls>, <ls>Me. 18</ls>, <ls n="Me.">35</ls>; <ls>V. 2. 23.</ls> {@--2@} Withered, faded: क्लांतो मन्मथलेख एष नलिनीपत्रे नखैरर्पितः <ls>Ś. 3. 26</ls>; <ls>R. 10. 48.</ls> {@--3@} Lean, thin, emaciated. {@--4@} Depressed in spirits, exhausted.
